item.title: Results
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: Typical Client Results When I work with clients in a strategic capacity, the following results are common: Meet business objectives faster Decreased development cost Decreased development time Improved user experience Reduced defect count and severity Improved engineering team morale Improved regulatory compliance Improved data security Improved operational effectiveness Improved brand repute Improved customer satisfaction Increased competitive advantage Decreased labor intensity for you and your staff For consulting, training, and coaching engagements, please contact me for details on how I can help your organization.
